tooltip.last_approved_text: Ruler of the Han Empire. Cannot be deployed in battles.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Ruler of the Han Empire. Cannot be deployed in battles.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Excels at attacking unarmoured opponents, but vulnerable in melee.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Excels at attacking unarmoured opponents, but vulnerable in melee.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Fury is the staple of the Nanman, as is the destruction it brings.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Fury is the staple of the Nanman, as is the destruction it brings.

tooltip.last_approved_text: To commune with the beasts is to inherit their strength.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: To commune with the beasts is to inherit their strength.

tooltip.last_approved_text: The beasts of the land understand its flow; so too do their handlers.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: The beasts of the land understand its flow; so too do their handlers.

tooltip.last_approved_text: A quick sting in the neck, then a light-headedness, then… nothing.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: A quick sting in the neck, then a light-headedness, then… nothing.

tooltip.last_approved_text: The elephant towers above men; a thundering wall of strength.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: The elephant towers above men; a thundering wall of strength.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Elephants move with purpose. For those in their way? Woe.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Elephants move with purpose. For those in their way? Woe.

tooltip.last_approved_text: A javelin is made to fly free, from the grip of the warrior to the chest of the enemy in a single, fluid motion.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: A javelin is made to fly free, from the grip of the warrior to the chest of the enemy in a single, fluid motion.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Though lacking the range of a catapult, the Juggernaut does not want for lack of short-range devastation.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Though lacking the range of a catapult, the Juggernaut does not want for lack of short-range devastation.

tooltip.last_approved_text: A rock may seem a simple thing, but in its brutal purpose it has few equals.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: A rock may seem a simple thing, but in its brutal purpose it has few equals.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Excels at inspiring friendly troops, but weaker in melee. Best grouped with retinues of Melee Cavalry.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Excels at inspiring friendly troops, but weaker in melee. Best grouped with retinues of Melee Cavalry.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Excels at breaking through enemy troops; however, weaker against other generals. Best grouped with retinues of Shock Cavalry and Polearm Cavalry.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Excels at breaking through enemy troops; however, weaker against other generals. Best grouped with retinues of Shock Cavalry and Polearm Cavalry.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Excels at locking down enemy generals or holding a chokepoint for a long period of time. Best grouped with a retinue of Glaive Infantry and Melee Infantry.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Excels at locking down enemy generals or holding a chokepoint for a long period of time. Best grouped with a retinue of Glaive Infantry and Melee Infantry.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Able to severely impair the efficiency of enemy units and generals in the battle. They also provide use of formations to nearby friendly units. However, they are extremely fragile. Best grouped with retinues of Ranged Infantry.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Able to severely impair the efficiency of enemy units and generals in the battle. They also provide use of formations to nearby friendly units. However, they are extremely fragile. Best grouped with retinues of Ranged Infantry.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Best used to engage enemy generals; however, weaker against units. Best grouped with retinues of Spear Infantry and Glaive Infantry.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Best used to engage enemy generals; however, weaker against units. Best grouped with retinues of Spear Infantry and Glaive Infantry.
